channel.title: [Added] August 2017 updates to DAC CRS non-embedded codelists
channel.description:
I’ve sent [a pull request](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/pull/171) to bring various non-embedded codelists up-to-date with those published by the [OECD DAC](http://www.oecd.org/dac/stats/dacandcrscodelists.htm).
## Summary of changes:
### Channel Code
* Add “Conservation International” (`21063`) * Add “National Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies” (`23501`) * Add “UN-led Country-based Pooled Funds” (`41503`) * Add “World Tourism Organization” (`41319`) * Add “Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank” (`46026`) * Add “Center of Excellence in Finance” (`47145`)
…And other assorted typos and corrections.
There’s a more detailed review of the changes in [the pull request](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/pull/171).

item.title: [Added] August 2017 updates to DAC CRS non-embedded codelists

item.description:
Many thanks again, @andylolz . We have now reviewed and approved the changes. The pull request will be merged and changes implemented on the IATI website early next week.

Read full topic

item.title: [Added] August 2017 updates to DAC CRS non-embedded codelists
item.dc:creator: andylolz
item.description:
I’ve sent a pull request to bring various non-embedded codelists up-to-date with those published by the OECD DAC.

Summary of changes:

Channel Code

  • Add “Conservation International” (21063)
  • Add “National Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies” (23501)
  • Add “UN-led Country-based Pooled Funds” (41503)
  • Add “World Tourism Organization” (41319)
  • Add “Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank” (46026)
  • Add “Center of Excellence in Finance” (47145)

…And other assorted typos and corrections.

There’s a more detailed review of the changes in the pull request.

Read full topic
